section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Crew leader" means an individual who:
provides individuals to perform agricultural work for any person;
on behalf of the crew leader or person for whom the agricultural work is performed, pays the individuals for their agricultural work; and
has not entered into a written agreement with the person for whom the agricultural work is performed under which the individuals who perform the agricultural work are designated as employees of that person.

text.section: Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, agricultural work, including agricultural work performed by an alien admitted to the United States to perform agricultural work under §§ 101(a)(15)(h) and 214(c) of the Immigration and Nationality Act, is not covered employment.

Agricultural work is covered employment if performed for a person who:
during a calendar quarter of the current or preceding calendar year, pays cash wages of at least $20,000 to individuals who perform agricultural work; or
for a part of a day in each of 20 consecutive or nonconsecutive weeks during the current or preceding calendar year, employs at least 10 individuals in agricultural work, regardless of whether the individuals are employed at the same moment.

section.section:
The crew leader is the employing unit for an individual employed in agricultural work who is not an employee of another employing unit if:
the crew leader holds a valid certificate of registration under the federal Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act;
substantially all of the individuals maintain or operate tractors, mechanized harvesting or cropdusting equipment, or any other mechanized equipment that the crew leader provides; or
the individual:

If the crew leader is not the employing unit for an individual employed in agricultural work under paragraph (1) of this subsection, the person to whom the crew leader provides the individual is the employing unit of the individual.

text.section: If under subsection (d)(2) of this section the crew leader is not the employing unit for an individual employed in agricultural work, any cash wages that the crew leader pays to the individual shall be considered cash wages paid by the person who is the employing unit for the individual and to whom the crew leader provides the individual.
